body.text:
ear Sir/Madam,

Greetings From Matangi Industries LLP !

This is to inform you that the payment against the attached invoice details will be due in the next few days. Kindly ensure that the payment is made on time.

If you have already made the payment, please ignore this email.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this matter.

Matangi's Bank Details:

BANK NAME : HDFC BANK
ACCOUNT NUMBER : 50200024833101
RTGS / IFSC CODE : HDFC0009122
ACCOUNT TYPE : CC ACCOUNT
BANK ADDRESS : GROUND FLOOR, SHOP NO: 5 TO 9, SHANKHESHWAR IND. PARK, PHASE-I, NR. RAILWAY BRIDGE, VATVA, AHMEDABAD-382245
BRANCH NAME : VATVA
IEC CODE : 0894003691
Swift Code : HDFCINBBAHM



Regards,
Accounts Receivable Team
